typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		sr_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as timestamp,
		sr_close_date as timestamp,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> SRS
source(output(
		sr_type as string,
		count as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> srTypes
source(output(
		product_id as long,
		count as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> productIDs
source(output(
		channel as string,
		count as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> channels
SRS assert(expectTrue(!isNull(sr_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_description) > 0 && length(sr_description) <= 100, false, 'descriptionLength'),
	expectTrue(sr_close_date >= sr_open_date, false, 'validCloseDate'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_cust_feedback) > 0 && length(sr_cust_feedback) <= 100, false, 'custFeedbackLength')) ~> Asserts
Asserts filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Filter1, custIDExists union(byName: true)~> noCustID
Asserts, Customers exists(SRS@customer_id == Customers@customer_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> custIDExists
Asserts, productIDs exists(SRS@product_id == productIDs@product_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> prodIDExists
Asserts, srTypes exists(SRS@sr_type == srTypes@sr_type,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> srTypeExists
Asserts, channels exists(SRS@channel == channels@channel,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> channelExists
noCustID, prodIDExists union(byName: true)~> noProdID
noProdID, srTypeExists union(byName: true)~> noSRType
noSRType, channelExists union(byName: true)~> noChannel
Asserts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SrsClean
noChannel sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> srsErrors
